name: Echoes of Erynnia
description:
Echoes of Erynnia is a classic JRPG for players looking for a challange.

Play as the young saviour of this world who has awoken from a crystalline sleep to purge the world from the minions sent by the "Devourer". Utilze powerfull spells or the power given to you by your weapon to fight in realtime combat, however, be warned - your enemies will make sure that you will regret every misstep you make.

This game was made in the context of a semester project at the Games Academy in Germany/Berlin. Seven people were involved in the production of Echoes of Erynnia.

The game concludes chapter 0, the opening act in which the player is introduced to the world.

Supported Input: XBox Controller, PS4 Controller, (may partially or fully support other Controller)
